name: Alleycat Faust
description:
The game was made for LD gamejam and is UNFINISHED. Please excuse the roughness of the game, I will develop it further as soon as possible.

You play as Faust, an alleycat with 9 lives. You must cross the road to get to food, and each time you die, the devil offers to buy your souls in exchange for powerups.

  • Controls: WSAD/arrow keys, Z, X, C
  • For EXE: Press Esc while dead to quit. 
  • Pressing Esc in the web version currently freezes the game, will fix this soon.

Made by Kostas Ventouras for Ludum Dare 44

Music: "Catnip" by George Baltatzis
